text: The 2007 Michigan State Spartans football team represented Michigan State University in the 2007 NCAA Division I FBS football season. Mark Dantonio began his first season as the Spartans' head coach. The Spartans play their home games at Spartan Stadium in East Lansing, Michigan. ==Schedule== ==Game summaries== ===UAB=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Overall Record ! Last Meeting !
